actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources)
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources).

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Nonnuclear Energy Research and Development Act of 1975 to provide generic authority to the Energy Research and Development Administration to utilize loan guarantee assistance to advance research, development, and demonstration of nonnuclear energy technologies.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Nonnuclear Energy Research and Development Act of 1974 to authorize the Administrator of the Energy Research and Development Administration to utilize Federal loan guarantees as a method of furthering nonnuclear energy research, development, and demonstration.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Nonnuclear Energy Research and Development Act of 1975 to provide generic authority to the Energy Research and Development Administration to utilize loan guarantee assistance to advance research, development, and demonstration of nonnuclear energy technologies.
